医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示社交媒体的使用与青少年心理健康问题的增加有关研究人员详细介绍了社交媒体如何塑造青少年的行为、认知和神经生物学变化，从而增加他们对心理健康问题的脆弱性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Social-media-use-linked-to-rising-teen-mental-health-issues-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Social-media-use-linked-to-rising-teen-mental-health-issues-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80382722-c8c8-41fd-b5db-16525d7387a7 Wed, 08 May 2024 20:46:00 -0400 Social media use linked to rising teen mental health issues, study reveals
临床试验显示 CRISPR 基因编辑具有治疗罕见失明的令人兴奋的潜力最近发表在《新英格兰医学杂志》上的一项研究调查了基因编辑的潜在用途，以纠正一种称为 CEP290 的先天性视网膜变性，这种变性会导致早发性视力丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Clinical-trial-shows-CRISPR-gene-editing-has-exciting-potial-to-treat-a-rare-form-of-blindness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Clinical-trial-shows-CRISPR-gene-editing-has-exciting-potial-to-treat-a-rare-form-of-blindness.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5a21444-f7ce-4dbe-a29c-a1254d2c9c52 Wed, 08 May 2024 10:28:00 -0400 Clinical trial shows CRISPR gene editing has exciting potential to treat a rare form of blindness
与智力障碍相关的基因可以调节学习和记忆人们发现一种先前与智力障碍有关的基因可以调节小鼠的学习和记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Gene-linked-to-intellectual-disability-can-regulate-learning-and-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Gene-linked-to-intellectual-disability-can-regulate-learning-and-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c66b4f8-c575-4479-9b75-a2db4a1914f7 Wed, 08 May 2024 07:39:28 -0400 Gene linked to intellectual disability can regulate learning and memory
新型头戴式设备有望缓解抑郁症状研究发现，一种产生超低频超低磁场的头戴式设备可以改善四名被诊断患有重度抑郁症的男性患者的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Novel-head-mounted-device-shows-promise-in-alleviating-depression-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Novel-head-mounted-device-shows-promise-in-alleviating-depression-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff5670a9-00ad-43fe-a86f-96c31117f56f Wed, 08 May 2024 07:23:16 -0400 Novel head-mounted device shows promise in alleviating depression symptoms
高盐摄入量与胃癌风险增加 40% 相关在高盐食品盛行的亚洲国家，高盐摄入与胃癌之间的联系已被证实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/High-salt-conspiration-linked-to-4025-higher-stomach-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/High-salt-conspiration-linked-to-4025-higher-stomach-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cfb44be-13a2-47c9-9eb6-99b55dd2efc9 Wed, 08 May 2024 07:09:00 -0400 High salt consumption linked to 40% higher stomach cancer risk
他们在超级碗游行中被枪杀——子弹可能永远留在他们的体内39 岁的詹姆斯·莱蒙斯 (James Lemons) 希望将大腿上的子弹取出，这样他就可以回去工作了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/ They-were-shot-at-the-super-bowl-parade-e28094-and-might-have-bullets-in-their-bodies-forever。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/ They-were-shot-at-the-super-bowl-parade-e28094-and-might-have-bullets-in-their-bodies-forever。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=085e311f-d389-4866-9a6b-aa213687967d Wed, 08 May 2024 06:53:12 -0400 They were shot at the super bowl parade — and might have bullets in their bodies forever
忘记按护士按钮。现在，患者可以通过佩戴它来保持联系。休斯敦卫理公会医院收治的患者胸前贴有一个半美元大小的监控设备，这在人工智能在医疗保健领域的广泛使用中发挥了不知不觉的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Forget-ringing-the-button-for-the-nurse-Patients-now-stay-connected-by-wearing-one.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Forget-ringing-the-button-for-the-nurse-Patients-now-stay-connected-by-wearing-one.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f435231b-2897-450a-a615-e9ca9b1e48c0 Wed, 08 May 2024 06:44:20 -0400 Forget ringing the button for the nurse. Patients now stay connected by wearing one.
研究发现，红色加工肉类摄入量与糖尿病女性严重肾损伤之间存在密切联系食用红肉、加工肉和白肉与发生肾脏损伤和糖尿病肾病的可能性之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Study-identizes-strong-link- Between-red-processed-meat-intake-and-severe-kidney-damage-in-diabetic-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Study-identizes-strong-link- Between-red-processed-meat-intake-and-severe-kidney-damage-in-diabetic-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6171b830-bb77-4dc9-9bbf-514fdd0682f2 Wed, 08 May 2024 06:17:00 -0400 Study identifies strong link between red, processed meat intake and severe kidney damage in diabetic women

研究发现慢性病会增加因热暴露而住院的几率环境热暴露对患有不同数量和组合的慢性疾病的个体住院治疗的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Chronic-disease-increases-the-odds-of-hospitalization-from-heat-exposure-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Chronic-disease-increases-the-odds-of-hospitalization-from-heat-exposure-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9e5fbf2-bcdb-4b7b-ab63-5c727b84b14d Wed, 08 May 2024 05:00:00 -0400 Chronic disease increases the odds of hospitalization from heat exposure, study finds
